name: Gregory Jade 38 Backpack - Women's
description: Beautiful sculpted designs and minimal seams keep this pack lightweight and streamlined. The Jade 38 offers enough capacity for a night out or multi-day missions. Free Float suspension keeps you cool and dry with trampoline-style suspension that creates a space for airflow between your back and the pack. With and trekking pole attachment points that double as ice axe loops make this pack capable of anything from a ridgeline epic to a 3-day desert route.Body fabric is 210 nylon ripstop with 630-denier high density nylon at the base for abrasion resistance.Low-profile Free Float trampoline style back panel adds ventilation without sacrificing load management or robbing volume to stash stuff inside.Adjustable torso length lets you dial in the perfect fit.Die-cut foam shoulder straps and hip belt for breathability.Lumbar foam for added comfort with a full pack.Women's specific shoulder straps and hipbelt are shaped to fit women's smaller and curvier bodies.U-shape zippered access to main compartment, with spin-drift collar under floating lid.2 exterior stretch water bottle pockets, a front stretch pocket and zippered lid pocket with key clip.Loops to hold trekking poles and your sunglasses (on the shoulder strap).Includes a rain cover with its own dedicated pocket.Designed for loads up to 16kg/35lbs.
